author: Staff Reporter
text:
Officials of Directorate of Vigilance and Anti-Corruption Bureau arrested Sanjeeva Kumar, an official at the Corporation's zonal office at Nallur, on Monday evening, on the charge of demanding and accepting bribe from a city resident.

Official sources said the official, posted in the bill collection section, was caught on a complaint from Velusamy, a resident of Nallur area, that he was asked to pay Rs. 10,000 as bribe to get the plan approval for a building he planned to construct.

Boy succumbs to injuries

K. Anwar (14), who sustained injuries after a lorry reportedly knocked down his cycle on Sunday night, died on Monday.

The accident occurred at Anna Nagar in Palladam.

Mujibur Rahman (13), who was riding pillion on the cycle, is hospitalised with severe injuries.

The Palladam police have registered a case and are investigating.
title: Official arrested on bribery charge
